General.Name: Shinkong Insurance Co Ltd
General.Description: Shinkong Insurance Co., Ltd. engages in the property insurance business in Taiwan. It offers motor, fire, marine, engineering, liability, and accident and health insurance products. The company was incorporated in 1963 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.15, Jianguo North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
